targets.expr: sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", pod=~"$wsjob-.*", container!="", image!=""}) by (pod, node)
max(max_over_time({metric="rt_iter_perf", wsjob="$wsjob"} |= `` | json | unwrap pa [$__interval])) by (replica_type, replica_id)
max(max_over_time({metric="rt_iter_perf", wsjob="$wsjob"} |= `` | json | unwrap ppa [$__interval])) by (replica_type, replica_id)

panels.description: Display info about failed pod errors. No data means no error.
panels.title: Failed Pods Errors

panels.description: Display info about whether assigned Systems had internal errors. No data means no error.

targets.expr: max(max_over_time(system_overall_health[$__rate_interval]) != 1) by (system) * on (system) group_left group(wsjob_system_grant{name="$wsjob"}) by (name, system)

panels.title: Assigned Systems Internal Errors

panels.description: Display info about whether assigned Systems had network errors. No data means no error.

targets.expr: max(((increase(system_network_flap_count[$__rate_interval]) >= bool 2) + 2 * (max_over_time(system_network_health[$__rate_interval]) != bool 1)) != 0) by (system) * on (system) group_left group(wsjob_system_grant{name="$wsjob"}) by (name, system)

panels.title: Assigned Systems Network Errors

panels.description: Network Counters that indicate job-fatal networking problems, increase over time. No data means no errors.
panels.title: Assigned Systems - Network Error Counters - Fatal

panels.description: Network Counters that may indicate the root cause of networking problems or performance issues, increase over time. No data means no errors. If the job succeeded, no action is needed for these.
panels.title: Assigned Systems - Network Error Counters - Debug
Assigned Systems - Glitch Counter Errors On Selected Die
Assigned Systems - VDDC_IOUT On Selected Die
Assigned Systems - VDDC_ASIC On Selected Die

panels.description: Display info about whether assigned Systems had warning/error events. No data means no warning/error.

targets.expr: (group by (system, severity, type, component) (system_events{severity=~"CRITICAL|ERROR|WARN"})) * on (system) group_left group(wsjob_system_grant{name="$wsjob"}) by (name, system)

panels.title: Assigned Systems Warning/Error Events

panels.description: System dev metrics for debuging purpose. System name, metric category/type can be changed from the top menu.
panels.title: Assigned Systems Internal Metrics

panels.description: Display info about whether assigned nodes had internal errors. No data means no error.

targets.expr: (max_over_time(kube_node_status_condition{condition=~"ClusterMgmt.*|ClusterDeploy.*|Csadm.*", status="true"}[$__rate_interval]) > 0) * on (node) group_left group by(node) (kube_pod_info{pod=~"$wsjob-.*", pod_ip!=""})
((min_over_time(node_health_overall[$__rate_interval]) == bool 0) > 0) * on (node) group_left group by(node) (kube_pod_info{pod=~"$wsjob-.*", pod_ip!=""})

panels.title: Assigned Nodes Internal Errors

panels.description: Display info about whether assigned nodes had network errors. No data means no error.

targets.expr: ((increase(interface_watch_list:status_changes_total[$__rate_interval]) >= bool 2) > 0) * on (instance) group_left label_replace(group(kube_pod_info{pod=~"$wsjob-.*", pod_ip!=""}) by (node, host_ip), "instance", "$1:9100", "host_ip", "(.*)")

((min_over_time(interface_watch_list:status[$__rate_interval]) == bool 0) > 0) * on (instance) group_left group by(node, instance) (label_replace(kube_pod_info{pod=~"$wsjob-.*", pod_ip!=""}, "instance", "$1:9100", "host_ip", "(.*)"))

panels.title: Assigned Nodes Network Errors

panels.description: Network Counters that indicate job-fatal networking problems, increase over time. No data means no errors.
panels.title: Assigned Nodes - Network Error Counters - Fatal

panels.description: Network Counters that indicate networking congestion or errors, or problems with nodes, increase over time. No data means no errors. If errors occur, notify the cluster operator to check for defective links.
panels.title: Assigned Nodes - Network Error Counters - Warning

panels.description: Network Counters that may indicate the root cause of networking problems or performance issues, increase over time. No data means no errors. If the job succeeded, no action is needed for these.
panels.title: Assigned Nodes - Network Error Counters - Debug

panels.description: Network congestion. If the job succeeded, no action is needed for these.
panels.title: Assigned Nodes - Network PFC Pause Duration Increase

panels.description: Job status from coordinator logs. Possible states: UNKNOWN, CKPT_IN_PROGRESS, IDLE, INPUT_STARVATION, DEADLOCKED, COMPLETED, TERMINATED, PROGRESSING.
panels.title: Training Status

panels.description: Summary of a deadlock, if detected.
panels.title: Deadlock Status

targets.expr: max(kube_node_status_capacity{resource="memory"} * on (node) group_left group by (node) (kube_pod_info{pod=~"$wsjob-$replica_type-$replica_id", pod_ip!=""})) by (node)
sum(node_namespace_pod_container:container_memory_cache{container!=""} * on (node) group_left group by (node) (kube_pod_info{pod=~"$wsjob-$replica_type-$replica_id", pod_ip!=""})) by (node)

sum(node_namespace_pod_container:container_memory_working_set_bytes{container!=""} * on (node) group_left group by (node) (kube_pod_info{pod=~"$wsjob-$replica_type-$replica_id", pod_ip!=""})) by (pod, node)
max(kube_node_status_capacity{resource="cpu"} * on (node) group_left group by (node) (kube_pod_info{pod=~"$wsjob-$replica_type-$replica_id", pod_ip!=""})) by (node)

sum(node_namespace_pod_container:container_cpu_usage_seconds_total:sum_irate * on (node) group_left group by (node) (kube_pod_info{pod=~"$wsjob-$replica_type-$replica_id", pod_ip!=""})) by (pod, node)

rate(node_network_transmit_bytes_total{device=~"e.*"}[$__rate_interval]) * on (instance) group_left (node) label_replace(group by (node, host_ip) (kube_pod_info{pod=~"$wsjob-$replica_type-$replica_id", pod_ip!=""}), "instance", "$1:9100", "host_ip", "(.*)")

rate(node_network_receive_bytes_total{device=~"e.*"}[$__rate_interval]) * on (instance) group_left (node) label_replace(group by (node, host_ip) (kube_pod_info{pod=~"$wsjob-$replica_type-$replica_id", pod_ip!=""}), "instance", "$1:9100", "host_ip", "(.*)")
max(max_over_time({metric="rt_iter_perf", replica_type="$replica_type", replica_id="$replica_id", wsjob="$wsjob"} |= `` | json | unwrap it [$__interval]))
max(max_over_time({metric="rt_iter_perf", replica_type="$replica_type", replica_id="$replica_id", wsjob="$wsjob"} |= `` | json | unwrap ct [$__interval]))
max(max_over_time({metric="rt_iter_perf", replica_type="$replica_type", replica_id="$replica_id", wsjob="$wsjob"} |= `` | json | unwrap ft [$__interval]))
max(max_over_time({metric="rt_iter_perf", replica_type="$replica_type", replica_id="$replica_id", wsjob="$wsjob"} |= `` | json | unwrap bt [$__interval]))
max by(metric) (max_over_time({metric="rt_iter_perf", replica_type="$replica_type", replica_id="$replica_id", wsjob="$wsjob"} |= `` | json | unwrap is [$__interval]))

list.name: wsjob
list.query: label_values(wsjob_annotation{cerebras_workflow_id=~"$workflow", labels_k8s_cerebras_com_Model=~"$model", job_type=~"$job_type", namespace=~"$namespace", start!="", end=""}, name)
